kri.wa 1375 di kurunagala rajadhaniye bindawatima samaga kotte rajadhaniyata dalada wahanse ragenawitha ehi dalada mandirayak idikara (warthamana athul kotte maligawa para athithaye parakumba piriwana saha kotte rajakiya mal uyana athara mada) dalada wahanse rakagannata paswani buwanekabahu rajathuma katayuthu karana athara 1505 warshaye lankawata godabasin pruthugisin 1509 di kotte rajakala sayawani wijayabahu raju maradama kotte arajika karaddi ohuge puthrayan thidena (suprasiddha wijayaba kollaya katha puwathe) gen hathwani buwanekabahu kotte rajyathwaya labaganna athara, rayigam bandara paswalalle koralaya (pasuwa rayigam koralaya bawata pathwu ada horana,bandaragama pradeshayada) da, mayadunne sithawaka da (warthamanaye padukke sita awissawella, sabaragamu kanduwatiya dakwa simawa) rajya thunakata beda palanaya karana ladi.

thawada ohuge samaye kriyathmaka karana lada prathipathathi walin antharjathika sahaya yuddaya sadaha laba ganimata hakiwiya (lakshman kadiragamar mahatha me anshayen prasansa katayuthu wana athara kumarathunga rajaya yatathe siduwu sadaniya karunak lesa ohuge dayakathwaya dakwiya hakiyi ) apa mehidi mathakadaba gatha yuththe mema wakawanuwe apata yuddaya sadaha mahaparimanayen mulyamaya upakara kirimata kisidu ratak nositi bawayi, mewani thathwayak thula ranil mahatha katayuthu karana ladde itha buddimathwayi (sunami sanna mandalaya ohu wisin gannalada ekama moda thiranaya wimata thibina ) 2005 di mahinda rajapaksa mahatha pathwanne dushkara kalayakayi, ranil wikramasinha mahatha aarthikaya diyunukarana thirana gannaladi (bohodena pawasana rajya sewaye rakiya nodima naraka laksanayak lesa dakkath ma dakinne eya hoda laksanayak lesayi ) mehidi rajapaksa mahatha jathiwadiyaku lesa bohodena hadinwuwath ma dakinne ohu kisi lesa jathiwadi nowu bawayi, namuth ohu dadi awasthawadiyakuyi.
prashna karaddi gahalath danawa....
mema chithrapatayen pasuwa nawathath boliwud chithrapatayak pradarshanaya wimata niyamithawa aththe labana wasare janawari 06 wanidaya.
wiruddha pakshaye deshapalana ka්riyakarinta deshapalanaya kirime ayithiya aaraksha karala dena lesa api maitha්ripala sirisena janadhipathithumangen illa sitinawa.
awashyathawak wuwahoth chandrika horagolla wenuwen satan wadina bawa api danimu.
namuth watahagatha yuththe thama thulada me durwalathawaya athi wiya haki bawa pamani.

gowiyan kiyala kiyana bahutharaya aththatama gowiyo nemeyi, rajayen idamak, wathura nomilema dila siyalu yedawum sahana padanamakin laba dunnama wawana bogaya rajayatama welandapale milata wada wadi milakata labadena rajaye sewakayo kotasak (aanduwe gowiyo) oya ganayata nowatena sulu pirisak innawa kalpitiye saha nuwara eliye, me aya, supiri matmamata nathath krushi thakshanaya (wisiri jala paddhathi / hayidrefanik / hayibriridi ata warga / krushi rasayana ) hondin pariharana karanawa.
eth ada api kiyanna yanne wenama deyak gana.
